Title: Mother of the Bride Beaded Bodice Gown with Sheer Overlay

Sizes: 6, 14, 20, 10, 18, 16, 8, 12

Colors: black, perry-blue

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: KD026-black-mother-of-the-bride-beaded-bodice-gown-with-sheer-overlay_p.jpg

----

Description: Mother of bride gown flows to the floor with a simple chiffon and a sweetheart neckline. There is a sheer overlay that creates a separates look. The overlay is beaded with an architectural pattern that is repeated on the hemline of the three quarter length sleeves.
